message.body: We need a fax number to reach you regarding the tabs for the car. We really need it today
We'll fax it. You need to sign it and fax it back right away. What is the time frame
Are you out of class at 10?
Please please please accept my apologies for all the rigamarole this morning. I read the expiration date wrong!!!!! Dad is soooooo pissed!
And I will need your drivers license number to change the address.
Thank you. Please don't be mad
I'm not mad!! I have no idea what's going on
OK will you answer my email? I'll write again soon. Love you
Make sure you pay your credit card bill. Chase has left a message. Would you like me to go to your account and pay it?
I did pay it... I paid it early! $25 was sent on the 27th
Happy Easter matt. I just woke up from a long nap and so glad Easter is done. I'm texting in case you are working. Call me if have a chance.
